ftp.controls

Class FtpControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • ftp.controls.FtpControl
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FtpAuthControl, FtpCdupControl, FtpCwdControl, FtpDataControl, FtpDeleControl, FtpMkdControl, FtpPassControl, FtpPasvControl, FtpPortControl, FtpPwdControl, FtpQuitControl, FtpRmdControl, FtpRnfrControl, FtpRntoControl, FtpSystControl, FtpTypeControl, FtpUnknownControl, FtpUserControl

    public abstract class FtpControl
extends Object
    Author:
    Sami BARCHID Abstract class implemented by every class in the package. It represents the basic algorithm of a controller that handles an FTP command. This class is the base of a simplified strategy pattern.

    • Method Detail

      • handle

        public abstract FtpReply handle(FtpCommand command)
                         throws IOException
        Handles the received command and returns the adequate reply. This method must be overridden by any FTP controller to manage the command in the right way.
        Parameters:
        command - the command to handle
        Returns:
        FtpReply the adequate reply.
        Throws:
        IOException - if a network error occured with the client's control connection.
